description: Mei's ultimate orchestration system for managing LLM instances at scale. This capability handles spinning up and shutting down LLM instances based on current load, load balancing requests across multiple instances, monitoring API costs in real-time, predicting capacity needs, and auto-scaling during peak hours. It's Mei's SS TIER responsibility.

usage.example:
const orchestrator = await library.checkout('llm-orchestration', 'mei');
await orchestrator.scaleUp(3); // Spin up 3 more instances
usage.input: Current load metrics, cost thresholds, scaling policies
usage.output: Instance status, cost reports, capacity predictions
typical_use_cases: Mei scaling up during high traffic
Mei shutting down idle instances to save costs
Mei load balancing requests across instances
Mei reporting resource usage to Julie
